page.title: 05WALKINGTON_LOCAL RECREATION.
page.content: RECRATION FOR THE OUTDOOR LOVERS IS TENNIS,BOWLING,JOGGING AND ALLOTMENTS TO TEND;WHILE INDOORS WE HAVE BALLET, TAP_DANCING,DRAMA AND BADMINTON.THERE ARE WEEKLY CLASSES IN PAINTING AND FLOWER ARRANGING DURING THE WINTER AND AN EMBROIDERY GROUP MEETING MONTHLY. THE MOST POPULAR ENTERTAINMENTS ARE HAYRIDE EVENTS,SEE"CUSTOMS";PANTOMIME, WHICH RUNS FOR 5 DAYS BEFORE CHRISTMAS WITH A STORY ADAPTED TO LOCAL PEOPLE AND SITUATIONS BY LOCAL ACTORS;MONTHLY QUIZES BETWEEN CLUBS AND SOCIETIES AND A CHILDRENS QUIZ IN THE INTERVAL;AND THE PUBLIC HOUSES. OCCASIONAL VISITING THEATRE GROUPS;AN ANNUAL CHURCH CONCERT OF VILLAGERS;AND THE WALKINGTON SINGERS LADIES HARMONY CLUB ALSO USE THE 120 ST VILLAGE HALL. FUND RAISING FETES,GARDEN_PARTIES AND COFFEE MORNINGS ARE MANY.PEOPLE RESENT THE ENDLESS DEMAND ON THEIR CHARITY.
